Description: The Pete Anderson PA-1's are a combined effort between Reverend Guitars and grammy award winning artist-producer who wanted the full hollow body sound and sustain and to operate at higher volume with reduced feed back thanks to the Korina innovative "uni-brace. This feature allows the guitar's hollow body to operate at higher volumes with the reduced risk of uncontrolled feedback. Laminated maple body, spruce top. Deep sea blues satin finish. Korena set in neck and ebony fret board (22 Frets), 12" radius, 1.69" graphite impregnated nut. Set neck with the duel acting truss rod allows inclusion of forward and back-bow adjustment. Reverends own pin lock tuners lock the string in place for exceptional tuning stability. Bound body (top and bottom) neck and F-holes. 2 custom voiced humbuckers of Reverends own design which to this humble joe is among my favorite brand of pick ups give this instrument distictive mid range twang and lower end warmth. Along with the bass roll off you may re-voice the humbucker where this sounds almost like it has coil taping. 1 each volume, tone, bass roll off and 3 way switching. Bushing mounted roller bridge and Bigsby B-70 with soft spring. Mint condition. Hard case and strap included
Title: Reverend Pete Anderson PA-1HB Custom  w/hard shell case
